data.title: From Painting to Marathons: a Royal Shift in Denmark
data.meta_description: Welcome to the weekend issue of Brussels Edition, Bloomberg’s daily briefing on what matters most in the heart of the European Union. Join us on Saturdays for deeper dives from our bureaus across Europe.
data.text:
Welcome to the weekend issue of Brussels Edition, Bloomberg’s daily briefing on what matters most in the heart of the European Union. Join us on Saturdays for deeper dives from our bureaus across Europe.

COPENHAGEN — Tomorrow is a day Danes never thought they’d see: The abdication of their beloved Queen Margrethe II in favor of her son, Crown Prince Frederik.
